item.title: [Initial Impressions] The Shoe Mart: Alden Ravello Indys
item.description: Alden Ravello Indy boots from The Shoe Mart Background As many know, getting on a list for rare colors of Alden shell can be difficult and once you’re on a list there are tales of people waiting for upwards of 3-5 years for a chance to buy the shoes they want. I seem to have lucked out a bit. I got on The Shoe Mart’s (TSM) list back in December of 2018 and got the email that I was at the front of the line for a model I was interested in in early June of this hellish year.
